title: Elden Ring
description: An epic open-world fantasy game developed by FromSoftware.

title: Animal Crossing
description: Build your island life with adorable animal villagers.

title: God of War: Ragnarok
description: Join Kratos and Atreus in an epic Norse journey of gods and monsters.

title: Minecraft
description: Build, explore, and survive in an infinite blocky world of creativity.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Explore a vast open world as Link in the critically acclaimed Zelda series.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
description: Based on The Lord of the Rings, the games story follows the lesser explored character of Gollum before the events of The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit.
